name: GMV

updates.text:
Today, we were at the European Space Astronomy Centre (ESAC) in Villanueva de la Cañada (Madrid) for the presentation of the Proba-3 mission, a milestone for high-precision satellite formation flying. This mission will enable groundbreaking scientific research, including an artificial eclipse to study the solar corona.

Our Space Strategy and Business Development Director, Mariella Graziano, joined the “Participation of Spanish companies in Proba-3” roundtable highlighting Spain’s leadership through Sener Aerospace & Defence and a consortium that includes GMV.

At GMV, we’re developing the Formation Flying Subsystem (FFS) and are responsible for monitoring and flight control components within the Flight Dynamics System, covering orbit determination, event prediction, and maneuver computation. Additionally, we design and validate the on-board function that uses GPS measurements for relative satellite positioning.

We’re thrilled to be part of this groundbreaking mission.

#Proba3 #SpaceMission #ESA

Andrea Pellacani, technical manager of the HERA mission at GMV, takes us behind the scenes of the European Space Agency - ESA's Hera mission in an engaging new story. In the latest #GMVblog article, Andrea shares how the Hera mission, designed to study the binary asteroid system Didymos, marks a crucial advancement in planetary defense technology and Earth protection.

GMV has been a key part of this project, developing the advanced autonomous navigation system that will enable Hera to navigate the challenging environment of deep space. With its arrival at Didymos planned for 2025, Hera will not only analyze the effects of the DART mission but also pave the way for new strategies in space safety. Read the full article to discover the story and technology behind this exciting mission!

https://ow.ly/NtUQ50TV9Ea

#Space #PlanetaryDefense

Image credit: ESA

Hoy hemos tenido el honor de recibir en GMV a Miguel López-Valverde Argüeso, Consejero de Digitalización de la Comunidad de Madrid. Su visita ha estado marcada por un notable interés en las diversas áreas en las que nuestra compañía opera, así como en los últimos avances en tecnologías disruptivas, como la computación cuántica. A lo largo de su intervención, ha planteado cuestiones sumamente interesantes, respaldadas por su sólida formación.

Desde que el profesor Dr. Juan José Martínez, catedrático de la Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenieros Aeronáuticos de la UPM, junto a un grupo de sus mejores alumnos, iniciara la aventura de GMV hace cuatro décadas, la innovación y la colaboración entre el sector público y privado han sido fundamentales en el desarrollo de la compañía

Luis Fernando Álvarez-Gascón, Director General de Secure e-Solutions de GMV y Pedro J Schoch, Director de Desarrollo Corporativo, Marketing y Comunicación de GMV han recibido al Consejero.

#Digitalización #Innovación #Liderazgo #TransformaciónDigital #ColaboraciónPúblicoPrivada #Tecnología

We have been selected by Spain’s DSN-Departamento de Seguridad Nacional to develop and deploy the first phase of the National Security System (SSN) Data Intelligence Platform, a crucial step in modernizing Spain’s critical infrastructure. This project, based on advanced big data and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies, will enhance the National Security System’s operational capacity.

The system incorporates "Zero Trust" and "defense-in-depth" principles to ensure the highest national security standards. GMV reaffirms its commitment to Spain’s security and defense by leading the DSN’s digital transformation and delivering our most advanced technological solutions.

https://ow.ly/ybQq50TUj5j

#PressRelease #Defense #BigData #AI

🌍 40 Years of Sustainable Growth at GMV 
Sustainability is at the core of our decision-making and every project we take on.

Ignacio Ramos Gorostiola, GMV’s People Strategy and Infrastructures Corporate Director, and Julia Yagüe, GMV's Remote Sensing & Geospatial Analytics expert, share how GMV is driving a business model aligned with the sustainability criteria the world needs. How do our activities contribute to a greener, more responsible future? 🌱

Watch the full video to discover our vision of sustainability’s role within the company.
https://ow.ly/Hm9M50TSBeA

#GMV40 #ExcellenceAndBeyond #TogetherWeMakeItHappen #Sustainability

Exciting news! GMV is proud to announce that the GMV-led consortium, including our teams in Romania and Spain and Alén Space, will manage the end-to-end lifecycle of ESA’s CyberCUBE mission.

This mission is a critical milestone in strengthening the cybersecurity of space-based assets, ensuring resilience against emerging cyber threats in future operations. 

Stay tuned as we continue to lead the way in safeguarding the future of space technology!

https://ow.ly/BmQw50TSlSv

#PressRelease #Cybersecurity #Space #CyberCUBE

The PAIT® (Pay Analytics Intelligence Tool) solution developed by Peoplematters and GMV is a technological tool that supports companies in complying with the new equal pay and pay transparency regulations.

The cutting-edge tool incorporates dynamic analysis and artificial intelligence algorithms in consulting services, providing an exhaustive and visual analysis of the pay gap through multiple variables.

https://ow.ly/SALM50TQBeE

#PressRelease #EqualPay #PayTransparency #AI

From innovative cross-domain solutions shaping the future of a growing industry to an insightful interview with the founders of Autek Ingeniería, Manuel Sanz, and Miguel Sanz, this edition is packed with exciting projects and stories.

What’s the secret behind GMV’s 40 years of growth?

Sara Gutiérrez Lanza, Director of GMV's Automotive Business Unit, and miguel angel molina cobos, Chairman of GMV's Space Council, reveal how innovation and diversification have driven our success across industries. Don’t miss their stories and reflections!

Watch the full video: https://ow.ly/OyuL50TNGbR
